notes: First Chrysler model, launched in 1924. High-compression inline-6 with innovative four-wheel hydraulic brakes. Brass-era complexity requires specialized vintage expertise. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler article, January 17, 2025 revision.
Mid-range Chrysler with inline-6 flathead. Four-wheel hydraulic brakes standard. Vintage brass-era complexity. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Premium Chrysler with larger inline-6. Advanced engineering for the era with hydraulic brakes. Brass-era restoration complexity. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Top-of-line luxury model with large inline-6 engines. Custom coachwork available. Brass-era complexity with rare parts and specialized restoration needs. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Imperial article, January 17, 2025 revision.
